item.title: Day 56 - Lists
item.description: [Lists] Okay, I did the list chapter from the Haskell book before Innodays, however I never did a blog post on it. And in this chapter there was some crucial information on the idiomatic ways Haskell deals with lists, so I am reviewing what I learnt and writing a post about it… The cons (:) operator One of these idiomatic Haskellism is the cons operator :. Haskell has 2 ways of defining the List datatype:
